title: The First Passover
description:
Readings from:
Exodus 12:21-28
Today's passages were read by Demelza Ramirez is a member of Imago Dei Anglican Church where she is the Lead Catechist for children ages 9-13. She is a third year seminary student.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
